description.part1: In MultiTwitch.co you can watch a multi streams of <0>twitch.tv</0>.
description.part2:
Simply add the channel ID in "Search a channel" input at the top of the page or in the url.
(ex: <0>multitwitch.co/peteur_pan/psykaoz/other_channel_id)
description.part4: You can also connect your twitch account to watch live of followed channels.
